Use caution when taking this article as fact.. I am a new owner of an and I must say the life is identical or better to that of my 2 (yes consumption has increased, obviously but they supplemented the as. They should have to set the consumption of the display)
Now my usage may be a bit different than the average persons as I am indoors 93% of my day.. My display brightness is set on 1/3-1/2 strength.. The resolution is stunning.. And I have not had a Heat issue.
Now I do not use my normally while charging, but that maybe where the Heat issue comes into play.
Thirdly, I have been the web Off and on over a 4g connection since 8 am... It's 3pm now and I am still at 65%. Now I haven't been pounding downloads.. Mostly we forums and news stations like drudge here..
Be your own judge..
